text: Ara tomadera barite tomara abasthana karabe, ara purbabarti ajnanatara yugera pradarsanira n'yaya pradarsana karo na, ara namaya kayema karo o yakata adaya karo, ara allahâ€Œra o tamra rasulera ajna palana karo. Nihsandehe allah cana, he grhabasinigana! Tomadera pabitra karate pabitratara dbara.
